editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The infection has begun and it’s up to you to strategically spread and evolve a deadly plague to bring about the end of the human race. Saving the world and being a hero is honourable, but decimating the world with a deadly infection is a whole lot of fun — even though it shouldn’t be.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Will you make it to the end?

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: A Dance of Fire and Ice

ios.subtitle: Roll the Dice, Pass Go & Win

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: From the creator of Plague Inc.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: We love dropping into this city builder’s immersive third-person view, which lets us stroll through bustling neighbourhoods of our own creation.

Build the perfect commute on your next commute with the hypnotic Mini Metro. Strategy buffs and casual gamers alike will enjoy expanding a busy transit system by linking stations, directing trains and upgrading lines. There’s a thrilling satisfaction in seeing underground lines come together—and since no two games play alike, we’re always trying out new designs.
editorialNotes.short: Construct the perfect commute in this underground masterpiece.

name: A Little to the Left: Drawers

ios.subtitle: No ads and no IAPs EVER.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Smartly positioning fighters in this roguelike deckbuilder helps the gameplay shine as brightly as the flame you’re tasked with defending.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Catchy music, incredible combo-filled combat, co-op play and a blast of nostalgic spirit ensures this classic brawling series still packs a punch.

The concept behind Kingdom Rush Frontiers is exceptionally simple: take the same great ideas, visual style, and fiendishly difficult tower defense that millions fell in love with in the original game and improve it by adding tons of incredible content. Frontiers packs new heroes, settings, towers, and tons of fresh enemies to fend off, making the frenzied action even harder to put down.

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

editorialNotes.standard: This point-and-click visual novel about raising the dead is full of creepy scenes inspired by Japanese folklore that might make you shudder.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Battle demigods with flying swords to lift a fantastical Chinese kingdom’s curse in this action-packed roguelike game.

ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Moving’s a drag! Relocate to this satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

ios.subtitle: Papa Louie's hot dogs to go

editorialNotes.standard: Intuitive deck building, a sinister game show setting and snarky quips from a malevolent Lady Luck keep us coming back to roll the dice in this fantastic roguelike.

name: Way of the Hunter Wild America

editorialNotes.standard: The latest in this gorgeous, long-running tower defence series adds cool twists, like playing with two heroes at once.

editorialNotes.tagline: Put an end to the terror

editorialNotes.standard: Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, you’ll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. It’s a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwo’s adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible

editorialNotes.standard: Nanuleu allows us to access our inner war general. Tasked with protecting our land from an increasingly crafty band of invaders, we dove headfirst into the game’s immersive tactical challenges and barely came up for air. Success requires patience, planning, and precision, but the rewards—outthinking your dastardly foes—are rich.

name: 求生无限: 无限流角色扮演大冒险

ios.subtitle: 穿越奇异世界的不思议生存游戏

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: 軒轅劍參外傳 天之痕

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: One of the most influential RPGs of all time, Final Fantasy VII takes you on an unforgettable journey through a harsh and unforgiving sci-fi landscape. Packed with tense turn-based combat and an extraordinary story, Square Enix’s masterpiece is as exhilarating now as it was when it was first released in 1997.
